snippet: Simmering tensions bubbled into public view when the powerful army chief and the country’s crusading chief justice issued hard-hitting statements.
abstract: Simmering tensions between Pakistan's top generals and judges bubble into public view when powerful army chief Gen Ashfaq Parvez Kayani and Chief Justice Iftikhar Muhammad Chaudhry issue hard-hitting statements that suggest unusual degree of friction between them.

byline.contributor: Declan Walsh contributed reporting from London.

lead_paragraph: Simmering tensions bubbled into public view when the powerful army chief and the country’s crusading chief justice issued hard-hitting statements.

headline.seo: Pakistan Generals and Judges Trade Barbs
headline.main: Top Pakistani Generals and Judges Trade Barbs
headline.print_headline: Top Pakistani Generals And Judges Trade Barbs
